claims.text: Flush belly fat overnight with our secret herbal tonic, featured in Wellness Weekly!

phrases.explanation: This is a red flag because it promises a specific outcome in a short timeframe (Rule 2, 10).
phrases.correct_feedback: Correct! This is a red flag due to its exaggerated and unrealistic claim.
phrases.incorrect_feedback: Incorrect. This is a red flag because it promises unrealistic results.

claims.text: Resistance training helps improve insulin sensitivity over time when paired with consistent nutrition.

phrases.incorrect_feedback: Incorrect. This is a green flag due to its specificity and evidence.

phrases.explanation: This is a green flag because it acknowledges gradual improvement (Rule 11).

claims.text: This one mushroom cured my anxiety forever. I also started meditating more.

phrases.text: one mushroom cured my anxiety forever
phrases.explanation: This is a red flag because it suggests a single ingredient can cure a complex mental health condition (Rule 7, 9).
phrases.correct_feedback: Correct! This is a red flag due to its oversimplified and unsupported claim.
phrases.incorrect_feedback: Incorrect. This is a red flag because it is unrealistic and unsupported.

claims.text: Used for centuries, acupuncture is still debated today. Some say it helps them relax.

phrases.text: Some say it helps them relax

phrases.correct_feedback: Correct! This is a green flag for acknowledging complexity.
phrases.incorrect_feedback: Incorrect. This is a green flag because it promotes balanced understanding.

claims.explanation: This statement includes appeals to tradition, vague anecdotes, and balanced acknowledgment of complexity.
